pos.offlineQueue.description: Enable the offline-first order queue, local SQLite persistence, and sync banners in the POS app.

pos.enhancedReceipts.description: Expose advanced receipt options including compact layouts, QR payloads, and barcode rendering.

callCenter.routing.description: Activate the call center workspace, Redis-backed queueing, and guided order capture flows.

driver.dynamicTracking.description: Enable adaptive GPS sampling, live route dashboards, and settlement summaries for drivers.

billing.saas.description: Expose SaaS subscription management, invoice PDFs, and pluggable payment gateways.

customer.loyalty.description: Surface loyalty points accrual, voucher redemption, and customer tiers in the client apps.

platform.dynamicPricing.description: Enable tenant-managed price adjustments, availability overrides, and evaluation APIs.

platform.experiments.description: Allow tenant-level opt-in to experimental features via the admin dashboard feature toggle page.
